text: Downtown Hades is the second album of the Norwegian thrash metal band Infernö. It was recorded and released in 1997. ==Track listing== #"Straight from Hell" – 3:35 #"Utter Hell" – 2:18 #"Rot in Hell" – 2:38 #"Roadkill" – 3:26 #"In Bed with Satan" – 2:23 #"Bulldozer" – 2:55 #"Alcoholocaust" – 4:12 #"Thrash till Death" – 2:47 #"Metal Attack" – 2:48 #"Violator" – 2:49 ==Personnel== *Aggressor (Carl-Michael Eide) – guitars *Necrodevil (Einar Sjursø) – drums *Bestial Tormentor – bass guitar *Hazardous Pussy Desecrator – vocals ==Trivia== *Utter Hell is also the name of Infernö's first album. *The title In Bed with Satan bears a strong similarity with Piledriver's Sex with Satan. *Bulldozer is also the name of an Italian 80's speed metal band. *The title Thrash till Death bears a strong similarity with Slayer's Fight till Death. ==References== * Category:Infernö albums Category:1997 albums
title: Downtown Hades
